narrative.title: 1St Armoured Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: British Armoured Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armoured warfare, exploitation, breakthrough operations. Tunisia Campaign: pursuit operations after Second Alamein, mountain warfare at Tebaga Gap.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Tunisian hills and valleys, mixed terrain (Tebaga Gap rocky passes)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combined arms operations (tanks, motorized infantry, artillery)
Sherman tank operations - superior firepower and reliability vs German Panzer III/IV

environment.terrain_type: Tunisian hills and valleys, mixed terrain (Tebaga Gap rocky passes)
